samples.text: No one even noticed I was gone.
Got the job!! Let’s goooo!
Everyone’s out there living their best life while I can’t even get a reply back.
It’s like I don’t exist to them.
Wow, great. Another meeting that could’ve been an email.
They never listen unless I yell.
I don’t feel anything anymore.
What’s the point of any of this?
Didn’t think I could do it, but I DID.
Just submitted my final project. Feeling unstoppable.
me? emotionally stable? lol good one.
This app is my therapist now
brb crying to Taylor Swift again
I’m not mad, I just expected better.
I feel like a burden when I talk about my feelings.
No one really *gets* me.
I got through the week. That’s something, right?
Tell me it gets better. Lie if you have to.
I wish someone would just ask me how I’m really doing.
Everything’s fine  (it’s not)
Even when I’m in a crowd, I feel alone.
No feedback on my work. Again.
I hate being seen as weak just because I cry.
Every little win feels huge lately.
I need a reason to get out of bed.
Honestly, I’m just tired of pretending I’m okay.
Not everything needs to be fixed. Sometimes we just need to be heard.
I miss who I used to be.
Can someone be proud of me for once?
Another day of bottling it all up.
